trans-unit.source: Provides a data structure to store extra data encountered by the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XmlObjectSerializer> during deserialization of a type marked with the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: 提供資料結構來儲存所遇到的額外資料<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XmlObjectSerializer>以標記的類型還原序列化期間<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractAttribute>屬性。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractAttribute> </xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XmlObjectSerializer>

trans-unit.source: The IExtensibleDataObject interface provides a single property that sets or returns a structure used to store data that is external to a data contract.
trans-unit.target: IExtensibleDataObject 介面提供單一的屬性，可設定或傳回用來儲存資料合約外部資料的結構。

trans-unit.source: The extra data is stored in an instance of the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ExtensionDataObject> class and accessed through the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.IExtensibleDataObject.ExtensionData%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 額外的資料會儲存執行個體中<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ExtensionDataObject>類別，並透過存取<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.IExtensibleDataObject.ExtensionData%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.IExtensibleDataObject.ExtensionData%2A> </xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ExtensionDataObject>

trans-unit.source: In a roundtrip operation where data is received, processed, and sent back, the extra data is sent back to the original sender intact.
trans-unit.target: 在其中接收、 處理以及送回資料來回作業，額外的資料會傳送回給原始傳送者保持不變。

trans-unit.source: This is useful to store data received from future versions of the contract.
trans-unit.target: 這是用於儲存接收自合約未來版本的資料。

trans-unit.source: If you do not implement the interface, any extra data is ignored and discarded during a roundtrip operation.
trans-unit.target: 如果您沒有實作的介面，任何額外的資料已忽略，並且在來回作業期間被捨棄。
若要使用這個版本控制功能 1。

trans-unit.source: Implement the IExtensibleDataObject interface in a class.
trans-unit.target: 類別中實作的 IExtensibleDataObject 介面。

trans-unit.source: Add the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.IExtensibleDataObject.ExtensionData%2A> property to your type.
Add a private member of type <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ExtensionDataObject> to the class.
Implement get and set methods for the property using the new private member.
trans-unit.target: 實作取得與設定方法使用新的私用成員的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Apply the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractAttribute> attribute to the class.
Set the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractAttribute.Name%2A> and <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractAttribute.Namespace%2A> properties to appropriate values if necessary.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractAttribute.Name%2A>和<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractAttribute.Namespace%2A>至適當的值，如有必要的屬性。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractAttribute.Namespace%2A> </xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractAttribute.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about versioning of types, see [Data Contract Versioning](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 型別的版本設定的相關資訊，請參閱[資料合約版本控制](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: For information about creating forward-compatible data contracts, see [Forward-Compatible Data Contracts](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需建立向前相容資料合約的詳細資訊，請參閱[向前相容資料合約](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about data contracts, see [Using Data Contracts](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需資料合約的詳細資訊，請參閱[使用資料合約](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the structure that contains extra data.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定包含額外資料的結構。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.ExtensionDataObject"></xref> that contains data that is not recognized as belonging to the data contract.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.ExtensionDataObject"> </xref>包含無法辨識為屬於資料合約的資料。
